definition: to store/to save/to have in reserve/heir/Taiwan pr. [chu2]
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The air pressure device and the air storage device are designed conjointly.
sentences.chinese: 氣壓裝置和儲氣裝置是連體設計的。

sentences.english: National Development and Reform Commission (NDRC) issued a notice clarifying the relevant price policy for gas storage facilities.
sentences.chinese: 發改委發佈關於明確儲氣設施相關價格政策的通知。
